author: Wayne Collins
method: Pour all of the ingredients except for the soda water into a cocktail shaker and shake well.  To serve, strain the mixture into a highball glass and top up with the soda water.
ingredients: 35ml/1Â¼fl oz gin ,  1 tbsp triple sec  ,  2 tsp orange flower water,  25ml/1fl oz freshly squeezed lemon juice,  2 tsp sugar syrup,  25ml/1fl oz egg white,  25ml/1fl oz double cream,  soda water, to serve
